channel.title: Golang on Vadim Saprykin
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Vadim Saprykin

item.title: How to make Go, WebAssembly and TypeScript work together
item.description: Recently in one of my pet projects I added Go code compiled in WebAssembly (WASM) for client-side execution. The interface is made with Svelte with TypeScript, and the logic is implemented in Golang. As a result, I got an interesting experience that I want to share: how to make Go, WebAssembly and TypeScript work together.
